com.tangocard
Class Transaction

java.lang.Object
  com.tangocard.Transaction
Direct Known Subclasses:
TransactionResponse
public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object

This class encapsulates a transaction, which constitutes an order id and a Card instance. In the future a transaction could possibly hold multiple cards, but for now it is limited to one

Version:
1.0
Author:
CMH, Winston E Williams
